MTL_expressions.description: Motor vehicle speed exceeds 100 kilometers per hour

propositions.description: Speed of the vehicle exceeds 100 kmph
assumptions: The speedometer of the vehicle is functioning properly
ambiguities: The temporal granularity could differ based on the speed of the vehicle

MTL_expressions.description: Vehicle maintains a distance of 100 meters or more from the vehicle in front in the same lane when speed exceeds 100 kilometers per hour

propositions.description: Vehicle maintains a distance of 100 meters or more from the vehicle in front in the same vehicle lane
assumptions: The distance indicator of the vehicle is functioning properly
ambiguities: The temporal granularity of maintaining the distance is not mentioned

MTL_expressions.description: When the vehicle speed is lower than 100 kmph, the distance from the vehicle in front may be narrowed, but not less than 50 meters

propositions.description: Vehicle maintains a distance of 50 meters or more, but less than 100 meters, from the vehicle in front in the same vehicle lane when speed is less than 100 kilometers per hour
assumptions: The distance and speed indicators of the vehicle are functioning properly
ambiguities: The temporal granularity of maintaining the distance is not mentioned

dependency_sequence.dependency_description: Speed exceeding 100 kilometers per hour, leads to maintaining a specific distance.
When speed reduces below 100 kilometers per hour, the distance can be narrowed, but not less than 50 meters.

non_formalized_parts.reason_for_non_formalization: This phrase is subjective and depends on the judgement of the driver. Hence, it cannot be formalized.
